alert.note: Alert for Marion; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 5:25PM CDT until July 08 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Marion County in east Tennessee... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitwell, or 12 miles north of Jasper, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Whitwell, Powells Crossroads, Martin Springs, Chimneys State Park, Lone Oak and Griffith Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
